title: Default locale can't be changed
body:
### Describe the bug

Default locale is not set when:

1. I use following command line -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=CH -Duser.variant=CH -Duser.region=CH
2. I use property quarkus.default-locale

### Expected behavior

Default locale must be set based on system properties.

### Actual behavior

Default locale is not set when:

1. I use following command line -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=CH -Duser.variant=CH -Duser.region=CH
2. I use property quarkus.default-locale

### How to Reproduce?

Start a quarkus application with command line -Duser.language=en -Duser.country=CH -Duser.variant=CH -Duser.region=CH and print the Locale.getDefault() is every time "en_US"

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk-17.0.1

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven 3.8.1

### Additional information

WIndows 10 Enterprise
